function:
def priority(item: float, bins: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    """Returns priority with which we want to add item to each bin using Worst Fit strategy.

    Args:
        item: Size of item to be added to the bin.
        bins: Array of capacities for each bin.

    Return:
        Array of same size as bins with priority score of each bin.
    """
    remaining_capacities = bins - item
    valid_mask = remaining_capacities > 0
    priorities = np.zeros_like(bins)
    priorities[valid_mask] = remaining_capacities[valid_mask]
    return priorities
